content: add some sunshine to your day with this cute sun keychain crochet pattern a quick happy little project that s sure to make you smile the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials ** * dk weight yarn * 2 5mm crochet hook * 8mm safety eyes * black embroidery floss * keychain * yarn needle stitch marker scissors the finished item measure approximately 2 5 x 2 5 6 5cm x 6 5cm item size may vary depending on the materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/sun-keychain-crochet-pattern-free-printable/
